name: Samba de Amigo: Virtual Party
summary:
It's time to shake it on center stage in this vibrant rhythm action game. Join Amigo and his friends in an all-new Samba de Amigo, now in VR.
Pick up your maracas and groove to over 40 hit songs from the world's most popular genres, with even more arriving as post-launch DLC!

Feeling confident in your skills? Complete the StreamiGo! challenges to help Amigo rise to fame.
Strut that style by customizing your character with unique costumes and accessories.
Show the world what you've got by competing on the online leaderboards.
